meanings.sent1: The abeles in the park provide shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent2: I planted some abeles in my backyard for their fast growth.
meanings.sent3: The abeles in the forest whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The abeles stood tall like guardians of the woodland.
meanings.sent5: The rustling leaves of the abeles created a soothing melody.

meanings.sent1: The abeles gathered to celebrate their harvest.
meanings.sent2: I met many abeles at the family reunion.
meanings.sent3: The abeles shared a hearty meal together.
meanings.sent4: The abeles' laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The abeles' kindness touched everyone's hearts.

meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to 100 fathoms.
meanings.sent1: The shipwreck was located at a depth of two abeles.
meanings.sent2: The sailors measured the distance in abeles to navigate the sea.
meanings.sent3: The treasure was buried six abeles underground.
meanings.sent4: The ancient map marked the location with an abeles symbol.
meanings.sent5: The diver descended slowly, reaching the seabed at three abeles.
